EmailTemplate.name: Sept18Web:Proposals.Thank You Sept18
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Attending our Webinar on Proposal Writing!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Webinar Registrant}},
Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to attend our webinar “Win New Consulting Business: The Four Keys to Writing a Successful Proposal Recorded webinar <http://f5159bf2f10bd6337d85-21700ed84a5e5d3baebf7221604c63ee.r66.cf2.rackcdn.com/2012-09-18_12.59_The_Four_Keys_to_Writing_a_Successful_Proposal.mp4> We invite you to sign-up <http://info.mbopartners.com/2012SeriesSignUp.html> to stay informed about future webinars in our series. If you have any topic recommendations or feedback, please email webinar@mbopartners.com <mailto:webinar@mbopartners.com>.
Thank you, MBO PARTNERS t: 1-800-220-0469
e: info@mbopartners.com
